mapper.select: select BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_THUMBNAIL, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_HEAD, AUTHORITY_NO from BOARD where BOARD_HEAD=#{boardHead} order by BOARD_NO desc
mapper.insert:
select BOARD_seq.nextval from dual
insert into BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_THUMBNAIL, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_HEAD) values(#{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardThumbnail}, #{boardRegdate}, #{boardHead}) where AUTHORITY_NO=#{authorityNo}
mapper.delete: delete from BOARD where BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} and AUTHORITY_NO=#{authorityNo}
